contents: Article 16 (Operation) ① The chairperson represents the committee and oversees its affairs. If the chairperson is unavoidably unable to perform his/her duties, the vice-chairperson shall act on his/her behalf in the order designated by the chairperson. ② The committee is convened by the chairman or chairperson as necessary. ③ The committee opens with the attendance of a majority of registered members, and matters to be determined as opinions of the committee are decided with the approval of a majority of members present. Revised January 31, 2019. ④ If the content of the matters to be deliberated by the Committee is deemed minor or urgent, a written resolution may replace the Committee decision. However, when the majority of the members request to formally refer the matter to the committee, this must be followed. Revised January 31, 2019. ⑤ Matters concerning the organization and operation of the Committee shall be governed by the ‘Regulations on the Establishment and Operation of the Advisory Committee’, except for cases specifically provided for in the Articles of Incorporation and these Regulations. Newly established 2019. 1. 31.
